item.title: <font color=red>Breaking: Petraeus submits resignation as CIA director</font> - Hot Air
item.description: Breaking: Petraeus submits resignation as CIA director http://t.co/ytRlZbVQ
item.content:encoded: Breaking: Petraeus submits resignation as CIA director http://t.co/ytRlZbVQ A total bombshell, breaking right now on Fox. Catherine Herridge says the only explanation given so far is “personal reasons,” but notes that he met personally with Obama yesterday and wonders if it may have had to do with the CIA releasing that timeline on Benghazi last week. That was my gut instinct too — either this is fallout from Benghazi or there really is something personal going on. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: hotair.com

item.title: Racist Teens Forced to Answer for Tweets About the 'Nigger' President
item.description:
Racist Teens Forced to Answer for Tweets About the 'Nigger' President:
The... http://t.co/XoEumyME
item.content:encoded: Racist Teens Forced to Answer for Tweets About the 'Nigger' President: The... http://t.co/XoEumyME There was an abundance of hate speech on Twitter after Obama's reelection, with people hurling violent and racial epithets. Many of those tweeters were teenagers whose public Twitter accounts feature their real names and advertise their participation in the sports programs at their respective high schools. Calls were placed to the principals and superintendents of those schools to find out how calling the president—or any person of color, for that matter—a "nigger" and a "monkey" jibes with their student conduct code of ethics. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: jezebel.com

item.title: 厚さが驚異の0.96mm！ 日本発の超薄型ディスプレイに世界が大興奮!! 海外の声「クソ最高だぜ、日本！」
item.description: 厚さが驚異の0.96mm！ 日本発の超薄型ディスプレイに世界が大興奮!! 海外の声「クソ最高だぜ、日本！」 http://t.co/zav9iq1l
item.content:encoded: 厚さが驚異の0.96mm！　日本発の超薄型ディスプレイに世界が大興奮!!　海外の声「クソ最高だぜ、日本！」 http://t.co/zav9iq1l 現在日本のとんでもないディスプレイに世界が大興奮している。そのディスプレイとは、モジュールの厚さが0.96mmという驚異の薄さを誇る超薄型ディスプレイ！ これを開発したのは、ソニー、東芝、日立製作所の合併会社「ジャパンディスプレイ」。彼らは各社の技術開発陣を集め、世界最先端ディスプレイ「イノベーションビークル」をこの世… Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Christ Christie Called Obama To Congratulate Him, Offered Mitt Romney Condolences Over Email http://t.co/VVURmNMX via @HuffPostPol New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie (R) told reporters Thursday he reached out to President Barack Obama with a personal phone call to congratulate him on his reelection.
